abstract: The seventh installment of the space epic will feature seven newcomers and six stalwarts.
snippet: The seventh installment of the space epic will feature seven newcomers and six stalwarts.
lead_paragraph: LOS ANGELES — After months of fan speculation, J.J. Abrams on Tuesday finally switched off the cloaking devices protecting the identities of his “Star Wars” cast members. Seven newcomers and six stalwarts will star in the seventh installment of the space epic, which is scheduled for release in theaters in December 2015.

headline.main: Cast Is Announced for Next ‘Star Wars’ Film
headline.print_headline: Star Wars’ Cast Mixes New and Old
